articles.title: Survey shows people are willing to buy the Pixel 6 over the Pixel 6a - Android Authority
articles.description: The Google Pixel 6a is $150 cheaper than the Pixel 6, but it turns out that most polled readers would opt for the full-blown flagship.
articles.content: Google unveiled the Pixel 6a last week at its I/O developer conference, delivering a mid-range phone thats powered by the same Tensor processor seen in the Pixel 6 series. Between this level of horse… [+3929 chars]
